item.description: kmh arts html, body, .container, .doublecontainer { width: 100%; /* undo comment-out when inline images included ! height: 100%; */ } body { background: #1f1f1f; font-family: 'Noto Sans KR', sans-serif; } .container, .doublecontainer { display: flex; flex-wrap: wrap; } .imagebundle { padding-right: 4px; position: relative; } .articleheader { width: 32.6%; height: auto; } .inline { width: auto; padding-bottom: 4px; } .single { height: 20%; } .double { height: 40%; } img.
